rows.description:
1. To play role as a full Stack Developer.
  2. Analyze, design, coordinate and supervise the development of software systems to form a basis for the solution of information processing problems.
  3. Analyze system specifications and translate system requirements to task specifications.
  4. Write codes to develop software system as specified Assist junior programmers with assigned programming assignments.
  5. Provide assistance to software testers and support personnel as needed to determine system problems.
  6. Provide feedback to analysis/training staff about performance considerations / usability issues concerning software specifications and implementation.
  7. Respond promptly and professionally to bug reports and review, refactor/repair legacy codes
  8. Provide recommendations to management concerning issues of programmer productivity and software development management.
rows.responsibility:
1. Provide assistance to software testers and support personnel as needed to determine system problems
  2. Provide feedback to analysis/training staff about performance considerations / usability issues concerning software specifications and implementation.
  3. Respond promptly and professionally to bug reports and review, refactor/repair legacy codes.
  4. Provide recommendations to management concerning issues of programmer productivity and software development management.
rows.benefit:
Probationary period: Six months; after successful completion of the probationary period, salary will be increased as per salary structure of the organization.

After confirmation as a permanent staff, she/he will have entitled three festival bonuses, Welfare facilities and other benefits as per organization policy.

Weekly 2 Holidays
rows.additional:
1. Strong OO design and programming skills
  2. Strong understanding of PHP, Laravel back-end development.
  3. Good understanding of front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery.
  4. Logical thinking and creative problem-solving ability
  5. Ability to multi-task and stay organized in a dynamic work environment.
  6. Ability to learn new programming languages quickly.
  7. Ability to analyze and determine whether a particular problem is caused by hardware, operating systems software, application programs, or network failures.
  8. Plan, process and perform all assigned jobs in an efficient manner with minimum/no assistance from the supervisor
  9. The candidate should have experience/exposure to the followings: Database (MySQL, SQLite or similar database management system)
  10. Skill in Node .Js & React .Js
  11. API Development & Integration.
rows.experience:
At least 3 year(s)

The applicants should have experience in the following area(s): Graphics Design

The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Design/Printing/Publishing
